row.special_powers: [ { "type": "trait", "name": "IMBUED BLADE", "description": "Characters that have taken damage from T-Ray's close combat attack can't be healed and damage dealt to them can't be reduced below 1." }, { "type": "speed", "name": "DEADPOOL'S ARCHNEMESIS", "description": "T-Ray can use Phasing/Teleport. When he does, you may instead place him adjacent to any opposing character with \"Deadpool\" in its name; after this action resolves, T-Ray may be given a close combat action as a free action.", "powers": [ "phasing_teleport" ] }, { "type": "attack", "name": "HIEROGLYPHIC SCRAPS OF PAPER", "description": "T-Ray can use Super Strength. Give T-Ray a free action and choose a standard attack power. T-Ray can use that power until your next turn.", "powers": [ "blades_claws_fangs", "energy_explosion", "pulse_wave", "quake", "super_strength", "incapacitate", "penetrating_psychic_blast", "smoke_cloud", "precision_strike", "poison", "steal_energy", "telekinesis" ] } ]
